headline: Smurfit Westrock Board Refresh Puts Audit Oversight And Integration Under Focus
summary: Smurfit Westrock (NYSE:SW) has announced upcoming Board changes, with two directors, including the Audit Committee Chair, set to step down at the next AGM. A new Audit Committee chair has been appointed, alongside wider committee succession plans that reshape Board oversight responsibilities. These moves adjust the governance structure for a company formed from a major packaging merger and now trading at a share price of $47.01. For you as a shareholder or potential investor, Board changes...
